button.invisible: not id or state in ('done', 'cancel') or not confirm_cancel

field.name: date_start
field.decoration-warning: state not in ('done', 'cancel') and date_start < now
field.decoration-danger: state not in ('done', 'cancel') and date_start < current_date
field.decoration-bf: state not in ('done', 'cancel') and (date_start < current_date or date_start < now)

field.name: move_raw_ids
field.context: {'default_date': date_start, 'default_date_deadline': date_start, 'default_location_id': location_src_id, 'default_location_dest_id': production_location_id, 'default_warehouse_id': warehouse_id, 'default_state': 'draft', 'default_raw_material_production_id': id, 'default_picking_type_id': picking_type_id, 'default_company_id': company_id, 'form_view_ref': 'stock.view_stock_move_operations'}

field.name: product_id
field.readonly: move_lines_count > 0 or state == 'cancel' or (state != 'draft' and not additional)

field.name: product_uom_qty
field.readonly: parent.state != 'draft' and ((parent.state not in ('confirmed', 'progress', 'to_close') and not parent.is_planned) or (parent.is_locked and state != 'draft'))

field.name: product_uom_qty
field.readonly: parent.state != 'draft' and ((parent.state not in ('confirmed', 'progress', 'to_close') and not parent.is_planned) or (parent.is_locked and state != 'draft'))

field.name: move_byproduct_ids
field.context: {'default_date': date_finished, 'default_date_deadline': date_deadline, 'default_location_id': production_location_id, 'default_location_dest_id': location_dest_id, 'default_state': 'draft', 'default_production_id': id, 'default_picking_type_id': picking_type_id, 'default_company_id': company_id, 'form_view_ref': 'stock.view_stock_move_operations'}

field.name: product_uom_qty
field.readonly: parent.state != 'draft' and ((parent.state not in ('confirmed', 'progress', 'to_close') and not parent.is_planned) or parent.is_locked)
